description:
In the library`s anteroom, they find Natsuno`s stalker Fujimaki Hotaru--her classmate Osawa Hami.
She and Kazuhito had once exchanged promises--that she would become an author and he would be her first reader. Having become an author, Hami returned to see Kazuhito. "Welcome home, Kazuhito-kun."
Source: crunchyroll
